title: Spurious RLS test failures

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

labels.name: A-spurious
labels.description: Area: Spurious failures in builds (spuriously == for no apparent reason)

labels.name: T-dev-tools
labels.description: Relevant to the dev-tools subteam, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
The RLS tests regularly fail on the tools builder even when the PR didn't touch anything RLS-related, and then the next PR landing switches the toolstate back to test-pass again. This is particularly bad during the week before the beta cutoff, where such a test failure leads to the PR being rejected.

I have seen this for weeks or even months, but to my surprise could not find an issue tracking this yet.
Cc @rust-lang/infra @Xanewok 

Some examples (with failing platform and test):
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/62209#issuecomment-506914620 (Linux, client_changing_workspace_lib_retains_diagnostics)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61199#issuecomment-506927309 (Linux, client_find_definitions)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61891#issuecomment-503326076 (Windows, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61932#issuecomment-503269750 (Linux, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61771#issuecomment-502950833 (Linux, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61889#issuecomment-502619562 (Windows, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/60730#issuecomment-502447094 (Windows, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/59752#issuecomment-502365726 (Linux, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61817#issuecomment-502228768 (Linux, client_find_definitions)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61789#issuecomment-501542743 (Linux, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61722#issuecomment-501353560 (Linux, client_completion_suggests_arguments_in_statements)
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/61758#issuecomment-501157704 (Linux, client_find_definitions)

And that's just for the last 17 days!
